flavorText: Summoned for all the wrong seasons.
name: Spirit of the Season
originalText: When Spirit of the Season enters the battlefield, it gains haste if it's summer. Put a +1/+1 counter on it if it's autumn. You gain 5 life if it's winter. If it's spring, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: To determine the season, use the calendar or whatever applies in your location.
Ignore the weather when determining which season it is. For example, if it’s snowing in spring, it’s still spring.
If your location doesn’t use a four-season system, you may need to get creative. Perhaps there is an analog you can use?

text: When Spirit of the Season enters the battlefield, it gains haste if it's summer. Put a +1/+1 counter on it if it's autumn. You gain 5 life if it's winter. If it's spring, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
